# contactType

**Instance Property**

An enum identifying the contact type.

## Declaration

```swift
var contactType: CNContactType { get }
```

## Discussion

For a list of predefined contact types, see [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContactType].

## Identifying the Contact

- **identifier**: A value that uniquely identifies a contact on the device.
- **CNContactType**: The types a contact can be.
